summary: The module runs a benchmark that trains a model on a single GPU using both the raw Transformer Engine and the Accelerate library with FP8 support, then compares the resulting metrics to verify that Accelerate matches the performance and accuracy of the native implementation.
business_intent: Validate that the Accelerate integration with FP8-enabled Transformer Engine delivers equivalent training results and performance to the original library on a single GPU, providing confidence for production deployment.
